at.htl.geometrics

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.geometrics.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent a triangle with the three corner Point or three Line. If the Points are edited the Lines are automatically updated and vice versa. Also the bisecting points of the triangle lines are stored.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jakob Ecker, Dominik Simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Triangle()
      Constructs a new empty Triangle - object.
      Triangle(Line a, Line b, Line c)
      Constructs a new Triangle - object form three lines.
      Triangle(Point p1, Point p2, Point p3)
      Constructs a new Triangle-Object from three points.
